channel.title: Christina's Blog Space
channel.description: This blog hosts informal thoughts and work that aren't related to academics/work.

item.title: Post With Code
item.dc:creator: Harlow Malloc
item.description: This is a post with executable code.

item.title: My First Blog Post
item.dc:creator: Christina Fan
item.description:
Why I’m Starting This Blog

I’m starting this blog because it’s an assignment for a computational research methods course I’m taking. However, maybe if I take a liking to posting my thoughts and ideas online for the public, I will continue sharing whatever random content comes along, and maybe it can be a meaningful way for people to spend their time reading about, whether because they can connect to it in some way, or simply to kill the time.

item.title: Welcome To My Blog
item.dc:creator: Tristan O'Malley
item.description:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.
